title: The default value set in list box of report parameter lost after modifying the default value.
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying it.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the report.
2. Navigate to the parameter settings.
3. Set the default value to 'aaa' in the list box.
4. Modify the default value.
5. Save the changes.

OB: 

EB: Change the Display type to Combo Box.

Expected result: 'aaa' should be the default value. After step 5, the OK button should be grayed out, indicating that no changes have been made.

Actual result: No default value was set. After step 5, the OK button is still active and can be used.
SR:
1. Open the report.
2. Navigate to the parameter settings.
3. Set the default value to 'aaa' in the list box.
4. Modify the default value.
5. Save the changes.
